Class SimpleCheckersGUI

java.lang.Object
  SimpleCheckersGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SimpleCheckersGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Creates a new instance of Board and draws a necessary graphical interface for the user to select possible moves. Provides options to exit and to start a new game in the form of a menubar at the top of the window

Constructor Summary
SimpleCheckersGUI()
          Constructor takes no arguments and forms a new game

winner

public java.lang.String winner()
Find out, if the game is over, who won and how that side won

Returns:
A String containing the side which won, as well as how they won (took other side's pieces, other side could make no more moves)
